about_the_game:
Enjoyed Selene ~Apoptosis~? This DLC is a means to both treat yourself and support the developer, so that we could provide you with more fun games!

Selene ~Apoptosis~ Supporter Pack includes:
  • Everything included in the Artbook
  • Alternative English voice for Selene (VA Miss Moonified)
  • Various additional art
  • Selene ~Apoptosis~ modder pack — assets for you to get creative with.
  • Developer diary [COMING THIS WEEK!]
  • Infinite love
  • A means of insuring future similar projects

You can find the DLC content inside your Steam game folder.
